description:
Strong, fast developing, friendly company is looking for Customer Support Representative.

The main set of people will be in August- September.

Progressive and professional team is looking for young, goal-oriented people, who are interested in self-development and job promotion. If you have ideas, desire to work and get a good salary, then come and join us. The job will be perfect for students, part-time workers and full day workers.


Job requirements:

  • Fluent English (perfect oral and written skills), Upper Advanced Level
  • Business communication skills
  • Ability to learn fast
  • Initiativeness and desire to work
  • Proficient PC and Internet user
  • Responsibility, attentiveness
  • Ability to work in a team

Main responsibilities:

  • Communication with clients (communication means: Internet, chat, phones, emails)
  • Work with content writers
  • Monitoring of order completion process
  • Resolve customers’ problems
  • No cold calling

Conditions of work:

  • Shift schedule (8 hours shift)
  • Ability to earn from $30 per shift to $40 per shift 
  • Minimum 3 shifts per week (first month), 3-4 shifts (after first month)
  • 2 month of probation period; Probation period is payable
  • Bonuses for extra hours/ shifts and great work performance

 

We offer:

  • Free trainings
  • Good working conditions
  • Future promotion
  • Bonuses
  • Friendly team and professional work environment
  • Convinient office location 
  • Ability to develop yourself from different sides
name: Customer support representative
